name: OCEAN CLUSTER Sea Glass Freshwater Pearl Swavorski Cyrstal Bracelet
description:
This statement sea glass sterling silver cuff bracelet, one of a set, consists of 15 total pieces of cobalt blue, seafoam and white North Shore sea glass, swavorski crystals, deep blue freshwater potato pearls, and peridot freshwater pearls. The focal point for the bracelet is a Karen Hill Tribe Sterling Silver Starfish - purchased directly from the tribe located in Thailand. The bracelet is a cluster design with all elements affixed by handcutting and turning sterling wire.


Shipping prices included non-optional insurance on USPS first class
